channel.title: Need Help with port forwarding
channel.description: I just cant get this ive been trying to get my friend to connect to my server for days now. I put the client on megaupload he downloads it and says "error connecting to server" when he trys to connect. Ive gona through tons of guides, it seems like i have all the portforwarding done right and i have no-ip and all that but i cant seem to get people to connect, is there any info i can put out to get help or have some1 else try to connect to my server?

item.title: Need Help with port forwarding
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

www.portforward.com
